message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $150.  This is a fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
